TYRRHENIAN SEA.
VESSEL, 12 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
VICINITY 40-00N 012-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4145, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 65 908 4527, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
